title: The Ugly Duckling (Captioned)
brief_description: Walt Disney introduces Danish story teller, Hans Christian Anderson, and presents an animated illustration of the writer’s life, from his humble beginnings as the son of a shoemaker and washer-woman, to his rise to international fame as a writer. This program also includes the well-known story of the Ugly Duckling.
